bioAsHtml: Ivan Kusalic is a Senior Software Engineer working for HERE in Berlin. He organizes Berlin’s Software Craftsmanship meetup, SoCraTes - International Software Craftsmanship and Testing Conference and Global Day of Coderetreat. He has also organized various meetups and Coderetreats. He speaks regularly at meetups and conferences. Ivan is passionate about well-crafted software, particularly in functional and strongly-typed direction.
